name: Unreal Room
description:
As for Intro to New Media finals, I decided to make an architectural room which you can walk around in through using Unreal Engine 4.

I have mainly used the official Unreal Engine's "Get Started With UE4" YouTube tutorials for the majority process and Blender for some of my own assets.

You can see the work in progress video clip I have recorded for fun to view the interactions within the room.
